question: Which of the following is true regarding NBFC?
option1: NBFC provides banking services to people without holding bank license
option3: NBFC is a part of payment and settlement
option4: NBFC can issue checks drawn on itself
answer: NBFC provides banking services to people without holding bank license
explanation: NBFC provides banking services to people without holding bank license. NBFC cannot accept demand deposits. NBFC is not a part of payment and settlement. NBFC can not issue checks drawn on itself.
